title: Chests, only Champion shards in them now?
body:
How is supposed to be the looting % about Chests?

Apparently, people keep finding only Champion Shards.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/B2NnOfV7-hextech-chest-problem

This should be the least probable event, according to LoL wiki:
**Champion Shards â€“ Uncommon (30% Frequency)**
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Hextech_Crafting

Weren't Skins even more common to find now, and wasn't that why they (surprisingly) reduced the Orange Essence gained from them?

replies.body:
Pretty sure it mostly depends on what type of chest you were opening. Sounds like you opened a levelup capsule, which will almost always drop champion shards.

Also, I wanted to point out that 

> http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Hextech_Crafting

isn't actually our website. It's third-party, so much of the information could be incorrect. I'd be sure to refer to our articles, here's the [**Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233)!
